properties.entry: INSERT INTO intro11e(chapterNo, questionNo, isCorrect, answerA, answerB, answerC, answerD, answerE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM intro11equiz WHERE chapterNo = ? AND questionNo = ?
INSERT INTO intro11equiz(chapterNo, questionNo, question, choiceA, choiceB, choiceC, choiceD, choiceE, answerKey, hint) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
